title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; chat, embed, pull, and manage models from Python scripts.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node & browsers; same API surface as the Python client.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package to use Ollama models as LLM or chat components.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-webui/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat UI, model manager, RAG, user auth).

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; idiomatic fluent API, async & streaming support.

title: ollama-rs
summary: Rust client library for Ollama with Tokio async runtime and streaming.

title: ollama-cli (go-llama.cpp wrapper)
summary: Lightning-fast Go CLI that bundles llama.cpp backends for easy local inference.

title: ollama-copilot.nvim
summary: Neovim plugin that brings local Ollama completions inline like GitHub Copilot.

title: ollama-chatbot (Streamlit)
summary: One-file Streamlit chatbot UI that talks to your local Ollama instance.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by deepset; use Ollama models in retrieval pipelines.

title: ollama-codex
summary: Drop-in replacement for OpenAI Codex using Ollama; powers CLI code completion.

title: ollama-rag (Python template)
summary: Minimal RAG template using Ollama embeddings + Chroma vector DB.

title: ollama-spring-boot-starter
summary: Spring Boot auto-configuration for Ollama; inject ChatClient as a bean.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Self-host Discord bot that answers questions using local Ollama models.

title: ollama-npm (community TypeScript wrapper)
summary: Community-maintained TypeScript wrapper with additional helper utilities.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node selection.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that caches and serves Ollama models inside CI pipelines.

title: ollama-rust-api
summary: Community Rust crate exposing strongly-typed async client for Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-models (Hugging Face mirror)
summary: Curated mirror of official Ollama Modelfiles plus community contributions.
